camzup.core.Edge3

Packages that use Edge3 
Package Description
camzup.core  

  • Uses of Edge3 in camzup.core

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    Edge3 Face3.getEdge​(int i, Edge3 target)
    Gets an edge from this face.
    Edge3 Mesh3.getEdge​(int i, int j, Edge3 target)
    Gets an edge from the mesh.
    Edge3[] Face3.getEdges()
    Gets all the edges in this face.
    Edge3[] Mesh3.getEdges()
    Gets an array of edges from the mesh.
    Edge3 Edge3.rotate​(float radians, Vec3 axis)
    Rotates the coordinates and normals of this edge by an angle and axis.
    Edge3 Edge3.rotate​(Quaternion q)
    Rotates the coordinates of this edge by a quaternion.
    Edge3 Edge3.rotateX​(float radians)
    Rotates the coordinates of this edge by an angle in radians around the x axis.
    Edge3 Edge3.rotateY​(float radians)
    Rotates the coordinates of this edge by an angle in radians around the y axis.
    Edge3 Edge3.rotateZ​(float radians)
    Rotates the coordinates of this edge by an angle in radians around the z axis.
    Edge3 Edge3.scale​(float scalar)
    Scales the coordinates of this edge.

    Scales the coordinates of this edge.

    Scales the coordinates of this edge.
    Edge3 Edge3.scaleGlobal​(Vec3 scalar)
    Scales the coordinates of this edge.
    Edge3 Edge3.scaleLocal​(float scalar)
    Scales the coordinates of this edge.
    Edge3 Edge3.scaleLocal​(Vec3 scalar)
    Scales the coordinates of this edge.
    Edge3 Edge3.set​(Vec3 coOrigin, Vec2 txOrigin, Vec3 nmOrigin, Vec3 coDest, Vec2 txDest, Vec3 nmDest)
    Sets the origin and destination coordinate, texture coordinate and normal data.
    Edge3 Edge3.set​(Vert3 origin, Vert3 dest)
    Sets this edge by vertex.
    Edge3 Edge3.translate​(Vec3 v)
    Translates the coordinates of this edge.

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    static float Edge3.azimuth​(Edge3 edge)
    Finds the azimuth of an edge.
    int Edge3.compareTo​(Edge3 edge)
    Compares two edges based on their identity hash codes.
    static Vec3 Edge3.eval​(Edge3 edge, float step, Vec3 target)
    Finds a point on the edge given a step in the range [0.0, 1.0] .
    Edge3 Face3.getEdge​(int i, Edge3 target)
    Gets an edge from this face.
    Edge3 Mesh3.getEdge​(int i, int j, Edge3 target)
    Gets an edge from the mesh.
    static float Edge3.inclination​(Edge3 edge)
    Finds the inclination of an edge.
    static float Edge3.mag​(Edge3 edge)
    Finds the Euclidean distance from the edge's origin coordinate to that of its destination.
    static float Edge3.magSq​(Edge3 edge)
    Finds the squared Euclidean distance from the edge's origin coordinate to that of its destination.
    static Vec3 Edge3.projectVector​(Edge3 edge, Vec3 v, Vec3 target)
    Projects a vector, representing a point, onto an edge.
